Articles.Content: Would anyone be able to recommend a quality visual enhancements mod? I really like the way some player's fanart looks and would love to have in my game as well. I have an acer gaming laptop, so I also can't use one that makes my computer explode!

Scatterer is probably the mod you're looking for.  It adds realistic atmospheric scattering to the game's graphics, which is a huge visual improvement.  Kerbin and Duna in particular no longer look like airless bodies from space, and look far more lifelike in the atmosphere.
Ok, should I use scatterer in addition to any other mods or does scatterer look good by itself?
